title: "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline" appears when I open the log-in screen
body: For some reason when I get to the login screen the username and password bars are grey and cant be edited and that message appears above it. This problem didn't happen before today so help would be really appreciated, Thank you.

replies.body: Thanks for the report guys!  Our network guys are looking into this now.  Let me know if you're able to get in now, and I'll offer updates as they come!
It still tells me that I am offline and won't let me log in.
Works now. Thanks for the bug fix!
I have the same problem. Tried the deleting line thing. Still doesn't work. Also restarted computer aswell. Please help riot.
As soon as I posted this comment, it started working! Thanks
works now, thanks 4 whatever u did...:0

I was having the same issue. I did the recommended fix by deleting the line in the config folder. It did not work. So I thought I would do the old uninstall and reinstall. It won't let you reinstall either. Just waiting for someone to fix it or put out another solution.
Restarting my computer hope it works!!
ok so I logged out and when i tried to log in ti happened again lel
friend is having the same issue in NA
I am the friend {{champion:131}}
It's fixed now. :D
I just had to restart my computer , it s working  for me
they had a fix for this 2 weeks ago but WTF IS GOING ON NOW lol server status isn't up either
i just log out to go on EUW server and nothing after that still cant on both server !

Just got talon.... cant even play him 
PLEASE HELP RIOT
You too eh, Just happened after a game I was playing ended
Still not solver guys ! do something ! {{champion:236}}
I've tried everything short of a repair...and I refuse unless it is the absolute last resort....Because IT WAS JUST WORKING UNTIL I GOT OUT OF MY FIRST GAME OF THE DAY!

Same for me.... Help! tried restarting PC no Help
"We're unable to log you in because you may be offline"
It's still not letting me log in. Still having the issue. What did you guys do?
UPDATE: It let me log in now, hope it works for you guys!!
Okay It let me log in now so hopefully it will work for u too
Same here.. I hope this doesn't take too long I wanna play kayn later on lmao
staff save us plez
Same Issue
Same here. Having the same issue; all known workarounds aren't working for me either. Also; I can't seem to get into the Service Status link on the boards. Are the servers down or something?
Having the same issue. Quitting and restarting doesn't help. Probably a server issue
I am having the same issue. I tried all the solutions I found on the internet. Nothing is working.
Also my internet is working fine
